article_title: A new place to play; $300,000 in upgrades planned for Andover park
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

Partly cloudy in the morning followed by scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High near 85F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Tim Lima tlima@eagletribune.com

og.description: ANDOVER — An Andover playground is in need of some serious TLC.
